name: Transformation Scroll (High Orc)
description: Use it to transform into High Orc for a while. Attention! The effect will vanish when mounted or dead. This item can’t be canceled once unsealed.

name: Transformation Scroll (Highland Parasite)
description: Use to transform into a Highland Parasite for a while. Attention! Transformation expired upon death or mounting This item cannot be canceled after opened.
